thread.title: Baltimore’s Jewish Community Center Gets Another Bomb Threat
thread.title_full: Baltimore’s Jewish Community Center Gets Another Bomb Threat

author: CBS Baltimore
title: Baltimore’s Jewish Community Center Gets Another Bomb Threat
text:
Baltimore’s Jewish Community Center Gets Another Bomb Threat March 15, 2017 10:17 AM Filed Under: Jewish Community Center 
BALTIMORE (WJZ) — Another bomb threat was called into the Jewish Community Center at Park Heights just before 9 a.m., Baltimore Police spokesman T.J. Smith says. 
Police are investigating the threat, one of several that have been made to JCCs across the country in the past several weeks. 
This story will be updated as more details become available.
